radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver shows no focal or textural abnormalities. The gallbladder is distended with wall edema (4 mm thickness). Pericholecystic fluid is present. Three intraluminal gallstones (two mobile, one immobile in gallbladder neck). Common bile duct not dilated (3 mm diameter). The spleen appears normal (10 cm length). Normal appearance of the aorta and inferior vena cava. Small parapelvic cyst in the left kidney.
